abstract: If Yahoo let Google sell ads on its search engine, its revenue might increase by 60 percent. But there are likely to be antitrust questions. One way around this would be for Yahoo to create an open system for any company to sell ads on its search pages, a competition Google is likely to win.
snippet: If Yahoo let Google sell ads on its search engine, its revenue might increase by 60 percent. But there are likely to be antitrust questions. One way around this would be for Yahoo to create an open system for any company to sell ads on its search ...
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said Wednesday that it would test Google’s search ads for the next two weeks as part of its consideration of potential ways it could fend off Microsoft’s hostile takeover offer.

headline.main: The Open Way Yahoo Could Do a Search Deal With Google
